failure.message:
1. Test Case ID: vgQXLQ
- API accepted schema-violating request
Invalid data should have been rejected Expected: 400, 401, 403, 404, 406, 422, 428, 5xx
[201] Created:
`{"access_token":"eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsImtpZCI6InVPY1EwQVdEdFU0bTAvWEEiLCJ0eXAiOiJKV1QifQ. // Output truncated...`
Reproduce with:
curl -X POST -H 'Authorization: [Filtered]' -H 'Content-Type: application/json' -d '{"email": "0@A.COM", "first_name": "00", "last_name": "00", "marketing_consent": 0, "password": "00000000"}' https://aclue-backend-production.up.railway.app/api/v1/auth/register
